articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Affinity’s image-editing apps go “freemium” in first major post-Canva update - Ars Technica
articles.description: Updated app is “free forever,” but won’t get a perpetually licensed version.

articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: WhatsApp adds passkey protection to end-to-end encrypted backups - TechCrunch
articles.description: This means if you lose your device, you can use methods like fingerprint, face, or the screen lock code of your previous device to access WhatsApp's backup.
articles.content: WhatsApp is adding a new way to access your encrypted backups with passkey support. This means if you lose your device, you can use methods like fingerprint, face, or the screen lock code of your pre… [+840 chars]
